from warehouse.otherout

from warehouse.otherout where state = '3'

insert into otherout(id, otherout_no, customer_id, state, remark, warehouse_id, create_id, creator, create_time, update_id, updator, update_time, audit_id, auditor, audit_time) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.otheroutNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update warehouse.otherout
otherout_no = #{otheroutNo},
customer_id = #{customerId},
customer_name = #{customerName},
state = #{state},
remark = #{remark},
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId},
create_id = #{createId},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_id = #{updateId},
updator = #{updator},
update_time = #{updateTime},
audit_id = #{auditId},
auditor = #{auditor},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
company_id = #{companyId},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select otherout.id as id, otherout.otherout_no as otheroutNo, otherout.customer_id as customerId, otherout.customer_name as customerName, otherout.state as state, otherout.remark as remark, otherout.warehouse_id as warehouseId, warehouse.name as warehouseName, otherout.create_id as createId, otherout.creator as creator, otherout.create_time as createTime, otherout.update_id as update_id, otherout.updator as updator, otherout.update_time as updateTime, otherout.audit_id as auditId, otherout.auditor as auditor, otherout.audit_time as auditTime, otherout.company_id as companyId from warehouse.otherout,warehouse.warehouse where warehouse.otherout.warehouse_id = warehouse.warehouse.id and warehouse.otherout.audit_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and warehouse.otherout.state = 0
and otherout.id like concat('%',#{otherout.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.otherout_no like concat('%',#{otherout.otheroutNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.customer_id like concat('%',#{otherout.customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.customer_name like concat('%',#{otherout.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.remark like concat('%',#{otherout.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.warehouse_id like concat('%',#{otherout.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.create_id like concat('%',#{otherout.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.creator like concat('%',#{otherout.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.create_time like concat('%',#{otherout.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherout.update_id like concat('%',#{otherout.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.updator like concat('%',#{otherout.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.update_time like concat('%',#{otherout.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherout.company_id =#{otherout.companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by otherout.update_time desc

select otherout.id as id, otherout.otherout_no as otheroutNo, otherout.customer_id as customerId, otherout.state as state, otherout.remark as remark, otherout.warehouse_id as warehouseId, warehouse.name as warehouseName, otherout.create_id as createId, otherout.creator as creator, otherout.create_time as createTime, otherout.update_id as update_id, otherout.updator as updator, otherout.update_time as updateTime, otherout.audit_id as auditId, otherout.auditor as auditor, otherout.audit_time as auditTime, otherout.company_id as companyId from warehouse.otherout,warehouse.warehouse where warehouse.otherout.warehouse_id = warehouse.warehouse.id and warehouse.otherout.create_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and otherout.id like concat('%',#{otherout.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.otherout_no like concat('%',#{otherout.otheroutNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.customer_id like concat('%',#{otherout.customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.state like concat('%',#{otherout.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.remark like concat('%',#{otherout.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.warehouse_id like concat('%',#{otherout.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.create_time like concat('%',#{otherout.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherout.update_id like concat('%',#{otherout.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.updator like concat('%',#{otherout.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.update_time like concat('%',#{otherout.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and audit_id like concat('%',#{otherout.auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and auditor like concat('%',#{otherout.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and audit_time like concat('%',#{otherout.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherout.company_id =#{otherout.companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by otherout.update_time desc

select otherout.id as id, otherout.otherout_no as otheroutNo, otherout.customer_id as customerId, otherout.state as state, otherout.remark as remark, otherout.warehouse_id as warehouseId, warehouse.name as warehouseName, otherout.create_id as createId, otherout.creator as creator, otherout.create_time as createTime, otherout.update_id as update_id, otherout.updator as updator, otherout.update_time as updateTime, otherout.audit_id as auditId, otherout.auditor as auditor, otherout.audit_time as auditTime from warehouse.otherout,warehouse.warehouse where warehouse.otherout.warehouse_id = warehouse.warehouse.id and warehouse.otherout.audit_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and warehouse.otherout.state in (1,2,4,5)
and otherout.id like concat('%',#{otherout.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.otherout_no like concat('%',#{otherout.otheroutNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.customer_id like concat('%',#{otherout.customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.remark like concat('%',#{otherout.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.warehouse_id like concat('%',#{otherout.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.create_id like concat('%',#{otherout.createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.creator like concat('%',#{otherout.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.create_time like concat('%',#{otherout.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherout.update_id like concat('%',#{otherout.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.updator like concat('%',#{otherout.updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and otherout.update_time like concat('%',#{otherout.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%')
and otherout.company_id =#{otherout.companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by otherout.update_time desc
